duties_responsibilities.duty: Interpret company policies and government regulations for payroll procedures
Examine work for exactness, neatness, and conformance to policies and procedures
Verify and confirm payroll processing figures tie with GL
Prepare GL entries for payrolls and accruals
Work cohesively with HR on projects to maximize benefits and communication to all employees

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree with a concentration in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
